articles: The rise of AI in healthcare: Machine learning models are now being used to predict patient outcomes with 95% accuracy

book_highlights: Atomic Habits by James Clear: Small changes compound over time - 1% improvement daily leads to 37x better results yearly
Deep Work by Cal Newport: Focus without distraction is becoming a rare and valuable skill in the modern economy
Thinking Fast and Slow: System 1 thinking is fast and intuitive, System 2 is slow and deliberate
research_snippets: Study finds that intermittent fasting can improve metabolic health markers including insulin sensitivity and cholesterol levels
Neural networks trained on diverse datasets show 40% better generalization compared to narrow training sets
Urban green spaces reduce stress levels by 28% according to longitudinal study of 10,000 participants
